webcrawler

Interface URLList

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    URLListArrayListImpl, URLListDBFinalImpl, URLListDBTempImpl

    public interface URLList
    Interface which provides access to the underlying list of URLs during the crawl, either through non-persistent in memory storage or through persistent storage in a database
    Author:
    Peter Hayes, Iain Ritchie
